name: Suspended (itch)
description:
Destroy as much as possible while avoiding the teachers who are trying to catch you.  There are powerups around the map and a secret key hidden somewhere that will give you access to a locked door.

This is my first ever game jam game, it was made in 7 days for the Winter Barjam 2021 with the theme "Suspense"

Controls
  • Move with WASD
  • Attack with SPACEBAR
  • Interact with E
Credits

The character models and a portion of the 3d assets are altered Kay Lousberg creations.  Make sure to check him out, I love his style. https://kaylousberg.itch.io/

Everything else was either made by me or was purchased on the Envato Market.
